org.teamfarce.mirch.entities

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.entities.PlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class PlayerController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    This class allows the player to be moved and controlled.

        (boolean) Whether this method acted upon the keypress or not. Used for InputMultiplexers

        Overrides:
